sequenceDiagram participant W as Web Client (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine) participant K as Keycloak participant S as Synapse Server Note over W,S: Initial Setup S->>K: Register with client_id & client_secret W->>K: Register with client_id (HealthTech_PatientRecords) Note over W,S: Authentication Flow W->>K: 1. Authorization Code Request K->>W: 2. Redirect with Auth Code W->>K: 3. Token Request (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) K->>W: 4. Access & Refresh Tokens Note over S,K: Server Authentication S->>K: 5. Token Request (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) K->>S: 6. Access Token Note over W,S: API Communication W->>S: 7. API Request + Access Token S->>K: 8. Token Introspection K->>S: 9. Token Validation Response S->>W: 10. API Response Note over W,K: Token Refresh W->>K: 11. Refresh Token Request K->>W: 12. New Access & Refresh Tokens Note right of K: Keycloak serves as the
Authorization Server
and Identity Provider Note right of S: Synapse uses confidential
client credentials flow Note right of W: Web Client uses
Authorization Code flow
with PKCE
